entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM MST Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -2.5°C

Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 21 April 2016
